channel.title: solana on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in solana on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Dynamic Liquidity Market Maker - a new form of concentrated liquidity AMM on Solana
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Dynamic Liquidity Market Maker (DLMM) is a new form of concentrated liquidity AMM on Solana, developed to make it easier and more sustainable for users and project teams to provide broader, deeper liquidity on Solana.

item.title: Introduce to Solana Token 2022 - new standard to create a token in solana
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Solana Token 2022 Program (Token extensions) is the next generation of the Solana Program Library standard. Token extensions introduce a new set of ways to extend the normal token functionality.

item.title: Solana core concepts
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Solana is a high-performance blockchain platform designed for decentralized applications and cryptocurrencies. Known for its fast transaction speeds and low costs, Solana uses a unique consensus mechanism called Proof of History (PoH) to achieve high throughput and scalability.

item.title: Metaplex NFT Compression
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: With the rise of NFTs on the Solana blockchain, there is a growing demand for these digital assets to be as commonplace as any other item on the internet.

item.title: Solana Account
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Unlike most blockchain, Solana separates logic and data into two separate components: Program and Account. What that means is that instead of storing data inside variables internally, Programs interact with external data stored in Accounts with the ability to mutate them.

item.title: Anchor framework
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This article features a short tutorial to start smart contract development on Solana using Anchor framework. Before you get started, we assume you already had the experience with:

item.title: How Tokens Work on Solana
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: How tokens work on solana - explain for EVM developers Let’s say you want to create a new type of fungible token, mint some to yourself, and then transfer some to your friend.
